I started applying to graduate schools Fall 2020. However going to graduate school requires a huge financial commitment here is a mini curated list of fellowship that could be helpful.

  1. Gem Fellowship
    Deadline : November 12
  2. NSF Graduate Research Fellowship
    Deadline : Date varies depending on graduate major, October 30
  3. Ford Fellowship
    Deadline : December 10
  4. Hertz Foundation
    Deadline : unknown
  5. Heidelberg Laureate Forum
    Deadline : February 11
  6. Google Fellowship
    Deadline : September 1 to September 30
  7. Facebook Fellowship
    Deadline : October 1
  8. Amazon Fellowship
    Deadline : unknown

  9. Microsoft PhD Fellowship
    Deadline : August 14

  10. Ada Lovelace Fellowship
    Deadline : September 21

  11. ACM SIGHPC Computational & Data Science Fellowship
    Deadline : June 24
  12. Snap research fellowship
    Deadline : unknown
